summary.Title: Production staff
summary.Presentation: We are looking for 5 production staff for our customer's food production. 5 for the night team and 5 for the evening team. This is a long-term temporary position with start-up as soon as possible.<

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for 5 production staff for our customer's food production. 5 for the night team and 5 for the evening team. This is a long-term temporary position with start-up as soon as possible.

The work itself consists of packing small and medium-sized products from the production line.

Our customer is an international customer, who produces food for private labels. The company is in Sorø. They place great emphasis on teamwork and that everyone should have a good working day.

We expect

- That you have a good physique, as you must stand up all the working hours

- That you can maintain an overview

- That you can work independently

We offer

- Salary by agreement

- Working hours night Monday to Friday at 22: 15-07: 15 and weekend at 18: 00-06: 30

- Working hours evening Monday to Friday at 14: 45-22: 30

- Overtime may occur

 

Do you want to know more?

If you are interested, call us or search via the ad. If you have any questions about the position, you are welcome to contact us at the following telephone number 31 60 22 88 on weekdays between 8-16.

 

Who is Marsøe?

We offer temporary and recruitment solutions for companies within Construction, Warehouse & Industry and IT, Administration & Sales. We are quality-conscious and take great pride in providing the best service to everyone we meet on our way. We are driven by a desire for success, and we are passionate about providing the best service for both clients and candidates.

We believe that success and results are created through good relationships with both customers, employees, and the employer, regardless of which industry you are in.

Marsøe ApS is physically located in Hvidovre, but our services extend throughout Zealand.
